title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Outline the specific features and functionalities of SleepOptimizer to be developed.

title: Design the AI Model Architecture
description: Develop a detailed plan for the AI model that will analyze sleep patterns.

title: Develop AI Model Algorithms
description: Write the algorithms for the AI model to analyze sleep patterns.

title: Create Wearable Technology Integration Plan
description: Outline how the SleepOptimizer will integrate with wearable technology.

title: Design Wearable Hardware Interface
description: Develop a plan for the wearable hardware interface design.

title: Develop Wearable Hardware Interface Design
description: Implement the design for the wearable hardware interface.

title: Develop SleepOptimizer Mobile Application UI/UX
description: Create the user interface and user experience for the SleepOptimizer mobile app.

title: Implement Mobile Application Backend
description: Develop the backend for the SleepOptimizer mobile application.

title: Perform Database Design and Integration
description: Design the database schema for storing sleep data and integrate it with the backend.

title: Test and Optimize the SleepOptimizer System
description: Perform extensive testing to ensure the system performs optimally.

title: Document the SleepOptimizer System
description: Write detailed documentation for the SleepOptimizer system.
dependencies: Test and Optimize the SleepOptimizer System
